data.title: Can you give me an example of an open-minded fictional character? I just need their act in one scene, or once.
data.meta_description:
Answer (1 of 5): The Ruler of the Universe — In the Hitchhiker’s Guide To The Universe

From the radio play of the Hitchhiker’s Guide To The Universe, Fit the Twelweth.


> MAN IN SHACK: But it’s folly to say you know what is happening to other people. Only they know if they exist.

ZARNIWOOP: Do...
